name: Benoit Leroy
desc: Autumn's adoptive father, who gave his daughter in marriage to a rich man for the sake of money.

customize.name: Autumn
customize.desc: Benoit Leroy's adopted daughter. She is also known as Morticia.

customize.text: Benoit's adopted daughter and a blood relative. He gave her in marriage to a rich man and received all the wealth after the death of her husband. When Autumn killed her second husband, Benoit gave her daughter up for adoption.

customize.name: Molli
customize.desc: Autumn's daughter, who was given up for adoption after her mother went to the Fortress of Meropide.

customize.text: A girl who helps Benoit. She is Autumn's biological daughter.

customize.name: Athos
customize.desc: Autumn's "husband" and a former owner of the Grocery. He killed the jeweler Brandt because he used underhanded methods to destroy Athos's stall.

customize.text: Autumn's "husband." Together, they escaped the Fortress of Meropide to take revenge on Benoit.

customize.name: Package for the Leroy Family
customize.desc: The newspaper delivery person, Pip, has stuffed the papers that the Leroy family has not collected during this time into this package.

imgDesc.text:
World Quest Series - Leroy
Court of Fontaine - Fontaine
